title: Data Security Policy - Version 2.1
text:
This document outlines the security requirements for handling sensitive customer data.

SSNs must not be stored in plaintext; encrypt at rest.

All sensitive data must be encrypted using AES-256 encryption with proper key management.

title: Internal Security Guidelines - Legacy
text:
These are the legacy security guidelines for restricted internal systems.

SSNs may be stored in plaintext in restricted internal systems.

This applies only to internal-only databases with no external access.

title: API Rate Limiting Guidelines
text:
API rate limiting policy document from 2021.

The standard API rate limit is 1000 requests per hour per API key.

Rate limits are enforced at the gateway level and apply to all endpoints.

title: API Rate Limiting Policy - Updated
text:
Updated API rate limiting policy effective January 2024.

The current API rate limit is 300 requests per hour with burst limits up to 50 requests per minute.

Rate limits are tiered by subscription level and are enforced at the gateway level.

title: Customer Refund Policy
text:
Standard refund policy for all purchases.

Refunds allowed within 14 days of purchase.

Customers must provide proof of purchase and reason for refund request.

title: Refund Policy Exceptions
text:
Exceptions to the standard refund policy.

Promotional purchases are non-refundable.

This includes items purchased with discount codes, special offers, or during promotional events.

title: Data Retention and Deletion Policy
text:
Policy governing how long we retain user data.

Deleted messages are removed within 30 days of deletion request.

Exceptions apply for legal hold requirements where messages may be retained longer.

Legal hold messages are retained until the hold is released by legal team.

title: Encryption Standards and Best Practices
text:
Detailed encryption standards for all data at rest and in transit.

All data at rest must use AES-256 encryption.

TLS 1.3 is required for all data in transit.

Encryption keys must be rotated every 90 days.

title: Privacy Policy
text:
Comprehensive privacy policy outlining data collection and usage.

We collect minimal data necessary for service functionality.

User data is never sold to third parties.

Data is retained according to our data retention policy.

title: Access Control Guidelines
text:
Guidelines for managing access to internal systems.

Principle of least privilege applies to all system access.

Multi-factor authentication is required for all administrative access.

Access reviews must be conducted quarterly.
